personal-details.name: Pankaj Malviya
personal-details.description: Currently, working with Jio Platforms Limited in the 4G/5G EPC Node, SCEF(Service Capability Exposure Function) Team.

about: Hello! My name is Pankaj and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back during my graduation when I decided to explore frontend technologies and I learned about the basics of HTML, CSS and JavaScript!

I am currently working with Jio Platforms using Java. I am willing to switch my domain to Web Development preferred Frontend. I have some basic knowledge of React Frontend Library. This portfolio website is also built with React.

description: Working with 4G/5G EPC Node, SCEF(Service Capability Exposure Function) using Java.
Performed testing for 4G Device Triggering Cases before release.
Developed solution for Converged NEF(5G) Solution for Device Triggering
Contributed in identifying and fixing a bug related to the Serving Node.
